Uses of Class
MPC.Decl

    • Uses of Decl in MPC

      Subclasses of Decl in MPC 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeclConst
      Represents a constant declaration in Pascal.
      class  DeclField
      Representation for a field declaration within a record declaration.
      class  DeclFormal
      Representation of a formal parameter declaration within a function or procedure declaration.
      class  DeclMember
      Representation for declarations of member-like things (fields, methods)
      class  DeclMethod
      Representation of a (MiniObject-)Pascal method.
      class  DeclProcFunc
      Representation forr a procedure/function declaration.
      class  DeclProgram
      Representation of a program declaration; note that this is just the NAME of the program, and is of little use
      class  DeclSpecial
      Representation of a special declaration (write, readln, etc.).
      class  DeclType
      Representation for a type declaration.
      class  DeclVar
      Representation of a variable declaration.
      Fields in MPC declared as Decl 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Decl Binding.decl
      The Decl of this TokenId pertinent to the context in which the TokenId occurs.
      Fields in MPC with type parameters of type Decl 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<Decl> Decls.decls
      decls holds the list of declarations of this Decls
      Methods in MPC that return types with arguments of type Decl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Decl> Decl.formalDeclsOf(boolean isVar, java.util.List<Binding> bb, Type t, int endPos)
      Static factory method for the formals in a group with the same type.
      java.util.Iterator<Decl> Decls.iterator()
      Provides an iterator over the Decl nodes of the Decls
      static java.util.List<Decl> Decl.varDeclsOf(java.util.List<Binding> bb, Type t)
      Static factory method for DeclVar objects all with the same type

      Prints an identifying tag before each Decl form
      void ASTVisitor.visitDeclBefore(Decl d) 
      Constructors in MPC with parameters of type Decl 
      Constructor and Description
      Decls(Decl d)
      Creates a new Decls instance consisting of a single declaration
      Constructor parameters in MPC with type arguments of type Decl 
      Constructor and Description
      Decls(java.util.List<Decl> dd)
      Creates a new Decls instance with no specific source code position.
      Decls(java.util.List<Decl> dd, int left, int right)
      Creates a new Decls instance given a List of its Decl nodes and its source (start/end)position
